=How to compile python-tesseract (for Ubuntu Natty)=
{{{
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:nutznboltz/tesseract
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install tesseract-ocr-dev python-all-dev swig
tar zxvf python-tesseract-xxxx.tar.gz
cd python-tesseract
python config.py
python setup.py clean
python setup.py build
sudo python setup.py install

==to make deb==
sudo apt-get install cdbs
./buildDeb

}}}


=How to compile python-tesseract (for Mac OS X Lion)=

First, install tesseract svn as suggested by mcradle<br>
[http://mousecradle.wordpress.com/2011/05/17/compiling-svn-tesseract-on-osx/]<br>
Then,<br> 
{{{
sudo port install leptonica swig
export LDFLAGS="-L/opt/local/lib"
tar zxvf python-tesseract-xxxx.tar.gz
cd python-tesseract
python config.py
python setup.py clean
python setup.py build
sudo python setup.py install


=How to compile python-tesseract (for Cygwin Windows 7)=

Still working on it.
Cygwin is buggy in producing shared library. To make it work, you must modify the LDFLAGS as
 

./configure LDFLAGS="-Wl,--no-undefined  -Wl,--as-needed" --prefix=/usr --enale-shared --disable-static

 
}}}
